DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Strategies Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder : Open Label Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Subjects must meet follow inclusion criterion qualify enrollment study : 1 . All subject 18 65 year age . 2 . Exclusion Criteria Subjects exclude study participation one follow exclusion criterion applies : 1 . Subjects unable unwilling give inform consent . 2 . No exclusion criterion comorbid DSM diagnosis . 3 . Subjects clinically define neurological disorder cause significant safety concern receive TMS treatment , include , limited : Any condition likely associate increase intracranial pressure . Space occupy brain lesion . Any history seizure EXCEPT therapeutically induce ECT ( childhood febrile seizures acceptable subject may include study ) . History stroke . Transient ischemic attack within two year . Cerebral aneurysm . Dementia . Mini Mental Status Exam ( MMSE2 ) score < 24 . Parkinson 's disease . Huntington 's disease . Multiple sclerosis . Increased risk seizure reason , include prior diagnosis increase intracranial pressure ( large infarction trauma ) , currently take medication lower seizure threshold . Medications low seizure threshold include Prohibited Concomitant Medication ( Section 5.8 ) . 4 . Subjects follow treatment history : TMS treatment within 6 month prior screen visit . Recent 2month medication change 5 . Contraindication receive TMS : Cardiac pacemaker , implanted medication pump , intracardiac line , acute , unstable cardiac disease .
